translation.appleMusicPlaylistUrlNotValid: Apple music playlist url is not valid
translation.appleMusicPlaylistDataRetrieved: Playlist data has been retrieved from Apple Music.
translation.appleMusicPlaylistDataRetrievingFailed: Playlist data could not be retrieved from Apple Music.
translation.spotifyUserFound: User has been found on Spotify.
translation.spotifyUserNotFound: User could not be found on Spotify.
translation.spotifyPlaylistCreated: Playlist with the name: {{name}} has been created.
translation.spotifySongNotFound: Song could not be found in Spotify.
translation.spotifySongSearchFail: Could not search songs on Spotify.
translation.spotifySongsFound: {{count}} songs has been found on Spotify.
translation.copiedToClipboard: Song url is copied to the clipboard.
